name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForImmuneSystemDisorders
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Immune System Disorders
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to immune disorders.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes immunoglobulin deficiences, complement deficiencies, and graft-versus-host disease.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
